thread.title: Soulja Boy Pranked With Baby Announcement
thread.title_full: Soulja Boy Pranked With Baby Announcement

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Soulja Boy Pranked With Baby Announcement
text:
Soulja Boy Pranked With Baby Announcement February 7, 2017 | 7:50 PM 8 
Soulja Boy takes another L as an Instagram photo posted to his account today (February 7) announcing a new baby is not even his. 
Soulja was apparently pranked by his friend M2 Tha K, who filmed himself posting the picture of the sonogram while the Atlanta rapper was sleeping. A video posted by M2THAK (@m2thaksodmg) on Feb 7, 2017 at 12:59pm PST 
Reports found that the image is actually from a mommy blog called Rooney’s Adventure in Pregnancy . 
This isn’t the first time Hip Hop fans have been trolled by a pregnancy announcement this week as Nicki Minaj teased fans with a pretty convincing photo of a baby bump. 
(This article was first published today [February 7, 2017] at 11:50 a.m. PST and is as follows.) 
In case you haven’t gotten enough Soulja Boy headlines yet in 2017, the Atlanta rapper shared the news today (February 7) that he is going to be a father. 
Soulja Boy made an Instagram post (that he then deleted) of an ultrasound image with a baby that says the pregnancy is 12 weeks along. 
As far as who the mother of the child is, we can only speculate. Soulja was romantically involved with India Love , but he never claimed her as his girl and even got in a beef with Lil Yachty over her. He has also had a rocky relationship with Love and Hip Hop co-star Nia Riley. 
Soulja Boy seemingly has at least one other child as he tweeted he was going to have a son in September. 
With his boxing match against Chris Brown up in the air, Soulja will have more reason to prove himself in the ring as he welcomes another bundle of joy.
